attributes.action: review the whole political structure of Parliament and the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently MPs are our local representive who can deal with local issues and who sits in Parliament, possibly taking a higher position within Parliament or Government. 

Gordon Brown should make his mark in British politics and order a review of how the system work. Local councils should have more powers and become more prominent. MPs will be for the Parliament and deal with only legislative and executive issues. They would therefore be based in London and require no second homes.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
